conversation.content: Um, yeah, so I'm calling about these, uh, bogus charges on my—wait, do you know who I am?
Let me just—okay, um, pulling up your account here. What's the, uh, the name on the account?
Jackson Landscaping. We do the, um, the municipal contracts downtown.
Got it, got it. So I've got account BUS-4429-JL here, and um, let me just, uh, check the rental history—what equipment are we talking about specifically?
The, uh, the aerator. I returned it on the—no wait, actually—it was the 15th.
Okay okay. So I'm seeing, um, rental ID RNT-88264-A for a core aerator, and it shows, uh, picked up October 15th, returned October 22nd, so that's the full week charge of—
No no no, that's—I mean, um, I brought it back the same day!
Right right. Let me just—hmm, actually I'm seeing a, uh, what's the word... a notation here. Says "customer declined receipt at return." Did you maybe—
Um, well, I was in a rush and, uh... but your guy said it was fine...
Sure, sure. So without that return receipt RCP-15102, the system just, um, it keeps charging until we do the physical inventory check, which was October 22nd.
This is, um, this is ridiculous. I need to speak to—do you even know how much business we...
Look, I totally—let me just—I can actually override this. Been here long enough. Adjusting to one-day rental, credit memo CRD-9847-X processing now.
Oh. Um, really? Just like that?
Yep. Shows, uh, $340 credit back to your account. Should hit in, um, 2-3 business days, reference number REF-2024-10-8892.
I'm sorry, I'm just—uh, it's been a really long week and...
No no, totally get it. Equipment costs are, um, they're brutal right now. Just, uh, next time grab that receipt, saves us both the headache.
Yeah, I—um, I should've just... anyway, thanks for fixing it.
All good. Oh and, uh, looks like you've got reservation RES-90125-B for the overseed tomorrow—still need that?
Um, oh right, yeah, definitely. That's still... yeah.
Perfect. Got you confirmed. Anything else I can, uh, help you with today?

scenario: landscaper, frustrated about equipment rental charges for dates he didn't have the equipment
